### Welcome
I am a **Full Professor** at the [Department of Telematic Engineering](https://www.it.uc3m.es/) of [**Universidad Carlos III de Madrid**](https://www.uc3m.es/). My [research](research.qmd) focuses on wireless networking, performance evaluation, and the intersection of AI and communications. Since January 2025, I've been acting as [Deputy Director of Infrastructure, Digitization, and Sustainability at the Polytechnic School](https://www.uc3m.es/ss/Satellite/UC3MInstitucional/es/ComposicionOrganismo/1371303276858/Infraestructuras,_Sostenibilidad_y_Digitalizacion).
